biotools.summary: A framework for promoter analysis based on a fast search engine using enhanced suffix arrays. The framework includes several statistics for calculating over-representation of motifs in a set of promoters from co-regulated genes compared to a background set.

bioschemas.name: ASAP
bioschemas.summary: A framework for promoter analysis based on a fast search engine using enhanced suffix arrays. The framework includes several statistics for calculating over-representation of motifs in a set of promoters from co-regulated genes compared to a background set.
